heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 1) (Calculation of 
Means) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations 

(Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2022/3 shall be 
construed together as one and may be cited together as the Social Welfare 
(Consolidated Supplementary Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 to 2023. 

the Social Welfare 

and 

Assessment of means

title: Pensions Act 2010 (No. 37 of 2010)) in Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social
heading: 2. (1) Article 36 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary
text_raw:
2. (1) Article 36 of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary 
Welfare Allowance) Regulations 2007 (S.I. No. 412 of 2007) is amended in 
paragraph (i), (inserted by article 2(b) of the Social Welfare (Consolidated 
Supplementary Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 3) (Calculation of 
Means) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 396 of 2022)) by the insertion after 
“Subject to” of “the cessation of this disregard on 17 March 2025, and”. 

(2) Article 2(2) of the Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary 
Welfare Allowance) (Amendment) (No. 3) (Calculation of Means) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 396 of 2022)) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th April, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[161] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 March, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 March, 2023. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [161]

title: Pensions Act 2010 (No. 37 of 2010)) in Table 2 to Schedule 3 to, the Social
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Social Welfare (Consolidated Supplementary Welfare Allowance) 
(Amendment) (No. 3) (Calculation of Means) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 396 
of 2022)) provide that income received (up to a maximum of €269.23 weekly 
which equates to €14,000 per annum) by a person from renting out a room in 
their home to a person who is not an employee, or an immediate family 
member will be disregarded in the assessment of means for the purposes of 
Supplementary Allowance. 

Article 2(2) of those Regulations provides for a cessation of that disregard with 
effect from 17 March 2023. 

These Regulations extend the duration of the disregard until 17 March 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [161] 5
